name: Newsgroups
desc: Software to access Usenet, to set up news servers, etc.

prog.name: brag
prog.description: Downloads and assembles multipart Usenet binaries

prog.name: canlock
prog.description: utilities for creating and verifying Usenet cancel locks

prog.name: gup
prog.description: let a remote site change their newsgroups subscription

prog.name: inn
prog.description: News transport system `InterNetNews' by the ISC and Rich Salz

prog.name: inn2
prog.description: 'InterNetNews' news server

prog.name: inn2-inews
prog.description: NNTP client news injector, from InterNetNews (INN)

prog.name: jamnntpd
prog.description: NNTP Server allowing newsreaders to access a JAM messagebase

prog.name: knews
prog.description: Graphical threaded news reader

prog.name: leafnode
prog.description: NNTP server for small sites

prog.name: nglister
prog.description: Downloads information from NNTP server

prog.name: nn
prog.description: Heavy-duty USENET news reader (curses-based client)

prog.name: pan
prog.description: newsreader based on GTK2, which looks like Forte Agent

prog.name: sinntp
prog.description: tiny non-interactive NNTP client

prog.name: slrn
prog.description: threaded text-mode news reader

prog.name: slrnface
prog.description: shows X-Faces from a newsposting on an X11 terminal emulator

prog.name: slrnpull
prog.description: pulls a small newsfeed from an NNTP server

prog.name: sn
prog.description: Small NNTP server for leaf sites

prog.name: statnews
prog.description: Extracts useful statistics out of a newsgroup or mailing list

prog.name: suck
prog.description: small newsfeed from an NNTP server with standard NNTP commands

prog.name: tin
prog.description: Full-screen easy to use Usenet newsreader

prog.name: trn4
prog.description: Threaded USENET news reader, based on rn (4.0 beta test)

prog.name: uucpsend
prog.description: Alternative Frontend for UUCP Batching with INN
